argument.name: markerGroup1
argument.description: The first marker group to include in the view calculation.

argument.name: markerGroupN
argument.description: Optional. Additional marker group(s) to include in the view calculation. You can specify as many additional marker groups as you want.

argument.name: markerGroupArray
argument.description: An array of marker groups to include in the view calculation.

page.description: Adjusts the Map Control's center point and zoom to view one or more markers in the specified marker groups.
